intro: Will you dare to face... Evil Tonight?
description:
Silvia never runs from evil—she makes it her business. Eccentric yet warm-hearted, this seasoned modern exorcist has mastered the art of confronting the supernatural, turning haunted places into tangible nightmares. But on this fateful night, nothing goes as planned.

Enter a relentless survival action experience where the unexpected awaits at every turn. Roam the eerie halls of an abandoned performing arts school—each room revealing a new piece of its dark past. Scavenge for scarce resources, crack intricate puzzles, and engage in heart-pounding combat against grotesque creatures and unforgettable bosses.

Evil Tonight combines classic survival-horror cues with fast-paced action, keeping you on edge but never forgetting the fun. Lose yourself in meticulously crafted pixel art, vibrant custom color palettes, and hand-tuned lighting effects—all set to a spine-tingling original score that elevates every moment of tension.

Will you dare to face... Evil Tonight?
